item.description:
Wallis Cove Photography Retreat
June 11-13, 2010, Douglas, MA

This is one jam packed weekend of photography education and entertainment all starting on Friday the 11th High Noon to Sun the 13th Afternoon. Feel free to sign up for all activities, or just come of Saturdays adventures. You'll have the chance to mix education and pleasure by hanging out on our beautiful beaches, hiking the forest trails, and paddling in the clear lake. For this weekend, Wallis Cove is exclusively for this photography group.

Quick List of the photo opportunities for this weekend:

- Professional models

- Trash the Dress

- Costumed interpreters

- Civil War Band

- Gravestone Girls

- Historic Outings

- Wildlife Sanctuary

- Classic Cars

- Portfolio Reviews

- Bonfire Chats

- Kayaks and Canoes

-2 private beaches for our group
- and more!

-All meals included and catered - Yum!

To see the whole weekends schedule please visit this link: http://www.walliscove...

Come and Be Inspired! Brand new to photography or lots of photography experience, youâ€™ll enjoy the Wallis Cove Photo Retreat! Comfortable environment to ask all your questions or share what you know!

Professional teachers/mentors:
Paul Smith, http://bit.ly/dv9HtG...
Alan Kidawski
Casey Danek, http://www.danekphoto...
Scott Erb & Donna Dufault http://www.erbphoto.c...


Details and Costs:

Full Retreat - Friday through Sunday
Includes all meals
Access to all events and activities
Cost $150

Want to just spend one day?

Saturday only - 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.
Includes lunch and dinner
Access to all Saturday events and activities
Cost $100

Retreat checks payable to: LaMich Productions.
Mail to:
LaMich Productions,
67 Island Rd.,
Douglas, MA 01516

Want to Stay Overnight with us?
Accommodations - Step outside your secluded cabin or ten that overlooks a private beach and enjoy the wonders of 100 acres of private forest.
Cabin bedroom, 1 double bed, $120
for weekend).

Cabin twin bed, loft, dorm style, $50
per person for the weekend.

RV site, dry camping (no elec, water
or sewer), $80 for the weekend. Port-
a-John available.

Tent sites, dry camping (no elec, wa-
ter), $40 for the weekend. Port-a-John
available.

Accommodation checks payable to:
Laurie Church, 67 Island Rd., Douglas, MA 01516


Where to find us:
Facebook link: www.facebook.com/walliscovephotoretreat
Web Site Link: http://www.walliscove...
Email: info@walliscove.com
Phone: 508-769-9137


Reservation not confirmed until check is received. Refundable only if we can fill your spot. Sorry, no credit cards. No refund for inclement weather, the retreat rain date is June 18- June 21, 2009.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Wallis Cove Photography Retreat - A Weekend Packed with Photo Ops and Learning!
